A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm here to bring the audience score for this movie up because honestly most of the hate this movie is getting is totally unwarranted. I saw The Last Jedi and it's definitely worth the watch. This film is super funny\, intense\, and action-packed from start to finish. It took everything I knew previously about Star Wars and threw it out\, and unlike some people I don't see that as a bad thing. The acting was superb and the visuals were stunning. There were so many unexpected moments I'm still comprehending them as I write this. It's a film that takes bold risks\, and I can see why some people don't like it but I think it's a step in the right direction to keep this franchise fresh and alive. I think this movie is great bravo Rian Johnson I can't wait to see how JJ wraps this up in 2019!
